author: travelandtourworld.com
title: High Heels Night at Mercury Lounge at Four Seasons Resort Dubai at Jumeirah BeachTravelandtourworld.com
text:
High Heels Night at Mercury Lounge at Four Seasons Resort Dubai at Jumeirah Beach Published on : Tuesday, September 22, 2015
Manolo Blahnik famously stated that a pair of high heels “transforms a woman,” which is why at Mercury Lounge at Four Seasons Resort Dubai at Jumeirah Beach is celebrating this connection between women and fashion by hosting the ultimate weekly occasion, High Heels Night. Mercury has embarked upon this journey with fashionistas’ favourite shoe brand Manolo Blahnik, the internationally renowned company known for its signature stilettos.
Cosmopolitan women can hotfoot their way up to Mercury’s rooftop lounge and enjoy networking and socialising over stylish cocktails specially customised for the occasion, soaking up the infectious energy from the live DJ, the expert bar staff’s creative mixology and legendary Four Seasons service. Delicious bites with a Mediterranean twist are the perfect accompaniment to a customised Cosmopolitan, all at 50 percent savings on Tuesday evenings from 7:00 pm. The chic backdrop of the elegant rooftop space with unrivalled 360-degree views across the Dubai city skyline and Arabian Gulf is the perfect place for friends to truly experience a taste of the “high life.”
Every month, Mercury Lounge will give one lucky lady the chance to win a pair of designer heels. High Heels Nights taking place every week beginning Tuesday, October 6, 2015.
In addition to being an established destination for premium beverages, Mercury Lounge will soon launch of new culinary dining offering with the introduction of a Chef’s Table experience in the weeks ahead.
Source:- Four Seasons Hotels & Resorts
